name: Blast the Blocks
description:
Game Description

Blast The Blocks is a single-player and 3D First Person Shooting Game. The game is created with Unreal Engine 5 and Multiple Geometric meshes to BLAST the blocks. The theme of this game is "Joy", and our group is focused on pure joy comes from destroying the objects and earning the points as an achieve the goal.

Game Progression Members

Daniel Hayward - Level Design

Zhihao Sun - Programming

Ruilin Lan - Programming

Soo Lee - Programming

Sizhong Li - Game Designer, Sounds(Musics)
